A fully featured topbar derived from the beautiful <a href="https://rosepinetheme.com/">RosÃ© Pine</a> theme, built for <a href="https://github.com/glzr-io/zebar">Zebar</a> - the modern desktop widget platform.
</p>

</p>

## âœ¨ Features

- **ğŸ¨ RosÃ© Pine Theme**: Beautiful color palette inspired by the popular RosÃ© Pine theme
- **ğŸ–¥ï¸ Multi-Window Manager Support**: Compatible with GlazeWM, Komorebi, and vanilla window managers
- **ğŸ“Š System Monitoring**: Real-time CPU, memory, battery, and network statistics
- **ğŸµ Media Controls**: Integrated media player controls with playback information
- **ğŸ• Smart Clock**: Elegant date and time display
- **âš¡ Performance Optimized**: Built with SolidJS for blazing fast performance
- **ğŸ¯ Responsive Design**: Adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes and resolutions

## ğŸ–¼ï¸ Preview

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Prerequisites

- [Zebar](https://github.com/glzr-io/zebar) v3.0.0 or higher
- Node.js 21+ and npm/pnpm/yarn
- A supported window manager (GlazeWM, Komorebi, or None/Vanilla)

### Installation

## ğŸ› ï¸ Development

1. **Clone the repository**

```bash
git clone https://github.com/m4rshe1/zebar-rose-pine-pp.git
cd zebar-rose-pine-pp
```

2. **Install dependencies**

```bash
npm install
# or
pnpm install
# or
yarn install
```

3. **Build the project**

```bash
npm run build
```

4. **Install in Zebar**
   - Copy the `zpack.json` file to your Zebar packs directory
   - Or use the development copy script: `npm run devcopy`

### Available Scripts

| Command                  | Description                       |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `npm run dev:glazewm`    | Build and watch for GlazeWM mode  |
| `npm run dev:komorebi`   | Build and watch for Komorebi mode |
| `npm run dev:vanilla`    | Build and watch for vanilla mode  |
| `npm run build:glazewm`  | Build for GlazeWM                 |
| `npm run build:komorebi` | Build for Komorebi                |
| `npm run build:vanilla`  | Build for vanilla                 |
| `npm run build`          | Build all variants                |

### Project Structure

```
zebar-rose-pine-pp/
â”œâ”€â”€ dist/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ glazewm/                    # dist folder for GlazeWM
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ komorebi/                   # dist folder for Komorebi
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ vanilla/                    # dist folder for Vanilla
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ bar/
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ background.tsx      # Background component
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ battery.tsx         # Battery status
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ cpu.tsx             # CPU usage
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ datetime.tsx        # Date and time
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ direction.tsx       # Direction indicators
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ glazewm.tsx         # GlazeWM specific
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ komorebi.tsx        # Komorebi specific
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ media.tsx           # Media controls
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ memory.tsx          # Memory usage
â”‚   â”‚       â””â”€â”€ network.tsx         # Network status
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ glazewm.tsx                 # GlazeWM entry point
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ komorebi.tsx                # Komorebi entry point
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ vanilla.tsx                 # Vanilla entry point
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.css                   # Shared css file
â”œâ”€â”€ resources/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ preview-image-1.png         # Preview image 1
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ preview-image-2.png         # Preview image 2
â”œâ”€â”€ glazewm.html                    # GlazeWM HTML entry point
â”œâ”€â”€ komorebi.html                   # Komorebi HTML entry point
â”œâ”€â”€ vanilla.html                    # Vanilla HTML entry point
â””â”€â”€ zpack.json                      # Zebar pack configuration
```

## ğŸ¨ Customization

The theme uses Tailwind CSS for styling, making it easy to customize colors, spacing, and layout. The main color palette follows the RosÃ© Pine theme:

- **Base**: `#191724` (background)
- **Surface**: `#1f1d2e` (surface elements)
- **Overlay**: `#26233a` (overlays)
- **Muted**: `#6e6a86` (muted text)
- **Subtle**: `#908caa` (subtle text)
- **Text**: `#e0def4` (primary text)
- **Love**: `#eb6f92` (accent)
- **Gold**: `#f6c177` (warning)
- **Rose**: `#ebbcba` (info)
- **Pine**: `#31748f` (success)
- **Foam**: `#9ccfd8` (highlight)
- **Iris**: `#c4a7e7` (secondary)
